survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Security Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their satisfaction with smart home security systems, including ease of use, reliability, and features.

questions.question_text: Which brand of smart home security system do you currently use?
